name: Bimmer
description: The $BIMMC Token is the official digital token of the Bimmer community, designed to bring fans, friends, and enthusiasts together around shared values of fun, creativity, and collaboration. Inspired by the story of Bimmer the Cat and his friends, the token acts as both a symbol of community identity and a tool for digital engagement. The mission of $BIMMC is to create a community-first ecosystem that rewards creativity, participation, and loyalty while promoting a sense of belonging.
